name: cmcd_object_type
sql:
(object_type) -> multiIf(
    object_type  = 'av', 'muxed_audio_video',
    object_type = 'v', 'video_only',
    object_type = 'a', 'audio_only',
    object_type = 'm', 'manifest',
    object_type = 'i', 'init_segment',
    object_type = 'c', 'caption_subtitle',
    object_type = 'tt', 'timed_text_track',
    object_type = 'k', 'key_license_cert',
    object_type)
